sentences.en: An end to the crisis seems a long way off.
sentences.cn: 这场危机看来远未结束。

sentences.en: Another year has passed, with no end in sight to the suffering.
sentences.cn: 又过了一年，痛苦还是看不到尽头。

sentences.en: At last it seemed the war might be coming to an end.
sentences.cn: 终于战争似乎即将结束。

sentences.en: at the end of the day I'm responsible for what happens in the school.
sentences.cn: 到头来，还是我对学校发生的事负责。

sentences.en: eg:the far end(= furthest from you ) of the room
sentences.cn: 房间的另一头

sentences.en: Every task has a clear end in view.
sentences.cn: 每一项任务都要有明确的目标。

sentences.en: For some people, competing is the be-all and end-all of their running.
sentences.cn: 对于有些人来说，赛跑的全部意义就是竞争。

sentences.en: Futures prices recovered from sharp early declines to end with moderate losses.
sentences.cn: 期货价格在早盘深幅下跌后出现反弹，收盘时未见严重损失。

sentences.en: He had wandered to the far end of the room.
sentences.cn: 他转到屋子的那一头。

sentences.en: He wore spectacles perched on the very end of his nose.
sentences.cn: 他的眼镜架在鼻尖上。

sentences.en: Hooker’s death marked the end of an era.
sentences.cn: 胡克的逝世标志着一个时代的终结。

sentences.en: I played the tape from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 我把磁带从头到尾播放了一遍。

sentences.en: I think we’ll end there for today.
sentences.cn: 我看我们今天就到这儿吧。

sentences.en: I've been here, oh, since the end of June.
sentences.cn: 我是，呃，6月底来到这里的。

sentences.en: if the damages award is not lowered it could be the end of the road for the publisher.
sentences.cn: 若不降低损害赔偿金，那家出版公司可能就完了。

sentences.en: Jo joined the end of the line.
sentences.cn: 乔排到了队尾。

sentences.en: Like the best stories, this one may yet have a happy end.
sentences.cn: 就像最精彩的故事那样，这个故事也许仍会有个美好的结局。

sentences.en: Many cinema-goers were stunned by the film's violent and tragic end.
sentences.cn: 许多来看电影的人都被这部影片暴力而悲惨的结局所震惊。

sentences.en: Only two go down at the end of this season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季末只有两支队伍降级。

sentences.en: our patience has come to an end.
sentences.cn: 我们一点儿耐心都没有了。

sentences.en: Producers decided to end her on-screen romance with Pierce Lawton.
sentences.cn: 制片人决定结束她在影片中与皮尔斯·劳顿的恋情。

sentences.en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentences.cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

sentences.en: she ended her days in London.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦度过余生。

sentences.en: she was at the end of her patience.
sentences.cn: 她简直忍无可忍。

sentences.en: She’ll do anything to achieve her own ends.
sentences.cn: 她为了实现自己的目标，什么都会去做。

sentences.en: Teachers inform me that Tracey's behaviour has improved no end.
sentences.cn: 老师们告诉我特雷西的行为大有改善。

sentences.en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
sentences.cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

sentences.en: The channel measures 20 feet from end to end.
sentences.cn: 这条管道全长为20英尺。

sentences.en: The end of the pencil snapped.
sentences.cn: 铅笔的笔尖啪的一声断了。

sentences.en: The King made major concessions to end the confrontation with his people.
sentences.cn: 为了结束与其臣民的冲突，国王作出了很大的让步。

sentences.en: The road ends here.
sentences.cn: 这条路到此为止。

sentences.en: The spacecraft is nearing the end of its useful life.
sentences.cn: 该航天器的使用寿命快要终结。

sentences.en: There are those, you know, who, by circumstance, end up homeless.
sentences.cn: 您知道，会有那么一些人，因为命运捉弄而落得无家可归。

sentences.en: These are kamikaze jobs, the ones almost guaranteed to end your career.
sentences.cn: 这些是极危险的工作，差不多准保能毁了你的事业。

sentences.en: these individuals have reached the end of their tether. .
sentences.cn: 这些人已忍无可忍（或筋疲力尽）了。

sentences.en: this treaty will end in tears.
sentences.cn: 这个协议会带来苦果。

sentences.en: Well, I hope that’s the end of the matter.
sentences.cn: 好啦，我希望事情就到此为止。

sentences.en: you really are the end!.
sentences.cn: 你真让人忍无可忍！。

words.tran_cn: 无止境的；连续的；环状的；漫无目的的
直立着的；向前的；末端朝前或向上的（等于endways）
竖着；末端向前地；两端首尾相接；向着两端（等于endways）

phrases.phrase: at the end of the day
be at (或 have come to) an end

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)是所能忍受的最大限度，达到了忍耐极限
到……结束时；到……时为止；在……之前

phrases.phrase: come to (或 meet) a sticky (或 bad) end
phrases.tran_cn: 遭到报应；落得悲惨下场；不得好死
（常作告诫语）会有不愉快（或痛苦）的结局；有苦果

phrases.phrase: the end of one's tether (或北美rope)

phrases.tran_cn: 生命（或事物发展）的尽头；穷途末路；完蛋

trans.tran_cn: 最后部分，结局，末端，终点，残余，破灭，方面，目的，辞世
trans.tran_en: the part of a place or object that is furthest from its beginning or centre
a situation in which something is finished or no longer exists
to finish what you are doing
